item.title: War Thunder Mobile Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All War Thunder Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in War Thunder
  • How to Get More War Thunder Codes

War Thunder is a popular game about battles on tanks, ships, and airplanes and finally, its mobile version has recently been released too. Of course, War Thunder Mobile is simpler compared to the computer version, but its main goal is to allow fans to participate in the battle, wherever they are. Although the gameplay on airplanes has been greatly simplified, the game still gained a large and growing audience. This was partly due to War Thunder codes that allow you to get cool rewards.

Updated December 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Below you will find all currently available codes. They will help you move forward faster and make the most of your time. Use them before it's too late.

All War Thunder Codes

Active War Thunder Codes

  • 52MONKEYS - Enter this code to get War Thunder - 1st Squadron Wukong Decal Bonus.
  • WTBUTCHER - Enter this code to get War Thunder - Buther Sticker.

Expired War Thunder Codes

  • PO-LI-GON
  • WARTHUNDER500K
  • WTDESCOM-BESTWORK
  • BRAVO

How to Redeem Codes in War Thunder

Developers usually add this option to the menu that can be accessed by pressing on the profile picture. In War Thunder Mobile , this is also the case, but after selecting this option, you will be taken to a special site created for redeeming codes. This can be confusing for many players, so we have prepared instructions that will show you how to redeem codes in War Thunder .

  • Launch War Thunder , and go through a short tutorial and complete one battle.
  • When you get to the hangar, find your profile picture in the upper-left corner near your nickname and click on it.
  • In the Account tab, click the Activate promo code button. You will be taken to the official activation code site that will open in your browser.
  • In the activation code field, paste the code from our list of active codes and click Activate. After that, you will receive a notification about the reward you have received.

How to Get More War Thunder Codes

We regularly update this page, so you can bookmark it to get all the active codes. You can also visit the official War Thunder pages on X, Facebook, Instagram, and the Discord server.

War Thunder Mobile is available on iOS and Android.

item.title: Pet Remake Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Pet Remake is a dynamic and fun gacha RPG inspired by the iconic Pokémon anime, sure to appeal to fans of the series and even casual gamers. Here, you as Ash, or Misty as a trainer, have to catch and upgrade Pokemon to take part in battles and tournaments to become a champion.

By redeeming Pet Remake codes, you can greatly simplify this task because you will get a bunch of resources and currency that will be enough for the first time. So, if you are a beginner or an inactive player, this is a great opportunity to quickly and easily get a bunch of useful things, don't hesitate.

Updated December 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: If you are looking for free rewards, this guide will help you. Use these codes to get the most out of the game. We are always looking for new codes.

All Pet Remake Codes

Working Pet Remake Codes

  • svip888 - Redeem this code to get the Legendary Pokemon 5-Choose-1 Box.
  • fet111 - Redeem this code to get 1,010 Diamonds, 10 Diamond Card Draw Coupons, 10 Time-limited Draw, and 10 Magic Gashapon.
  • fet222 - Redeem this code to get 5,000,000 Coins, 5,000 Diamonds, 50 Diamond Card Draw Coupons, and 5 Deluxe lunchboxes.
  • fet333 - Redeem this code to get 5 Deluxe lunchboxes, 10 Colorful Ice Cream Cones, 10 Moomoo Milk, and 400 Sweet Ice Water.
  • fet444 - Redeem this code to get 5,000,000 Coins, 5,000 Diamonds, 100 Diamond Card Draw Coupons, a Deluxe lunchbox, and 400 Sweet Ice Water.

Expired Pet Remake Codes

  • 2f03e43d7371 - Redeem this code to get 250,000 Coins, 5,000 Diamonds, 20 Berry Juice, 20 Diamond Card Draw Coupons, and 10 Magic Gashapon.

Regardless of your progress in the game, rewards from Pet Remake codes will always be a useful and pleasant bonus for your progress in the game. It is a convenient and easy way to get precious currency, as well as rare items or resources that you might not have.

How to Redeem Codes for Pet Remake

Similar to other mobile games, the Pet Remake redemption system is simple and straightforward, but to access it, you will first need to complete the tutorial, which will take about 10 minutes. Once that's done, follow these steps to learn how to redeem your Pet Remake codes:

  • Launch Pet Remake and go to the main menu.
  • Pay attention to the bottom-left corner of the screen. There will be three round gray buttons with different icons arranged in a row. Among them, interact with the third one with the gear icon.
  • This will open the settings menu. In the lower section of the menu, you will see a red button labeled Gift Code. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and two red buttons on each side of the menu. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the red checkmark button to the right of the menu to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Pet Remake Codes

Similar to many other free mobile games, to get more Pet Remake , head over to the game's official social media and take a look at the latest posts and announcements. Usually, developers regularly share codes along with other content, so you may be lucky enough to find something new and be the first to receive rewards:

  • Official Pet Remake Discord server.
  • Official Pet Remake Facebook page.

Pet Remake is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Soul Knight Prequel Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Soul Knight Prequel Codes
  • Soul Knight Prequel: How to Redeem Codes

Soul Knight Prequel is an immersive fantasy game that takes you back to medieval times where you have to fight against a bunch of enemies and bosses. You can realize any of your dreams by playing as the desired class, such as a paladin, a powerful sorcerer, or many others, as the choices are vast. Surviving in this world is not easy, but with Soul Knight Prequel codes, you can make your progression process easier. By redeeming the codes, you will receive many useful rewards, ranging from fragments to good weapons and armor.

Updated December 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Great news - new codes are available. Use them now to get your rewards.

All Soul Knight Prequel Codes

Going into battle without equipment and supplies is a terrible idea because you will simply get killed. Instead, you will need to gradually develop your character to master skills and find new weapons. The developers are generous and have provided the opportunity to redeem codes that are often posted in official sources, so you can get cool rewards just by following them, or by visiting this site sporadically to find all the active ones immediately.

Active Codes

  • sau4B9 - Redeem this code to get 10 Gems and Stellarite. (NEW)
  • m789QK - Redeem this code to get 10000 Coins and 300 Lesser Enhansor Fragments. (NEW)
  • THX4ALLGP - Redeem this code to get Captain Paloma’s skin, 3x Gale Juice, 3x Housing Snapshots, 3x Bullion, Tempest Juice, and Life Juice.
  • ASTHX4ALL - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Expired Codes

  • DAILYFREEBIE - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • YULEBALL - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • 2024NEWYEAR - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • HAPPYDAY - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Soul Knight Prequel: How to Redeem Codes

Before you can redeem the codes, you'll need to complete a short tutorial to learn the mechanics of the game. When you do, don't rush into battle, but rather get free rewards from the codes. Here's how to do it:

  • Go to the Chapterhouse, the base location where you can rest after your adventures.
  • Next, move to the left side of the location, where you will find a lake and a house with a red tile roof.
  • To the left of the house, you'll notice a mailbox, so you should approach it and interact with it.
  • After doing so, you will open a new menu showing the contents of your inventory, the amount of currency you have, and the letters you have received.
  • On the left side of the screen, you will also notice two icons, one of which looks like a key in an envelope.
  • Interact with this icon, and you will be taken to another tab where you will see an input field and a green checkmark button.
  • Enter the code manually, or copy it into the input field, and then click on the green button to get the rewards.

Repeat these steps with all active codes to collect all rewards. Remember that the codes have a limited expiration date and the developers will not wait for you to redeem them, so hurry up.

Soul Knight Prequel is available on PC, Android, and iOS.

item.title: Genshin Impact 5.3 Special Program Date and Time
item.description:
Summary

  • Update 5.3 in Genshin Impact will introduce new characters Mavuika and Citlali, two highly anticipated five-star units.
  • The Special Program for Version 5.3 on December 20, 2024, will feature free Primogems and promotional codes.
  • Mavuika will be an offensive unit with a Pyro-infused motorcycle, while Citlali is rumored to be a Cryo support with shields and AoE Cryo damage.

Genshin Impact has confirmed the official release date and time for the new Special Program for Version 5.3. Since its release, Genshin Impact has been hosting livestreams before each update, revealing most of the upcoming content, including regions, characters, and weapons.

Developer HoYoverse has confirmed that Update 5.3 will feature two new five-star units: the long-awaited Mavuika and Citlali. Mavuika has been one of the most anticipated characters in the game since the Natlan region arrived, which is not a big surprise considering she's known as the Pyro Archon.

Besides showcasing the new characters and weapons in action, another reason players look forward to Special Program events is the opportunity to get free Primogems, as the livestream includes three Genshin Impact promotional codes. A new post on Genshin Impact 's official Twitter account revealed that Version 5.3 will be called Incandescent Ode of Resurrection and is scheduled for December 20, 2024, at 7:00 AM (UTC-5). The official art for the program features Mavuika, and players can expect the update to revolve around this Archon, who is expected to be featured in the first banner cycle. Meanwhile, Citlali should get her banner appearance in the second part of the update.

Genshin Impact: 5.3 Special Program Date Confirmed

When it comes to their performance on the field, recent Genshin Impact beta leaks have revealed that Mavuika will be an offensive unit that can fit into multiple team compositions. At the same time, Citlali is rumored to be a Cryo support. Mavuika's kit will allow her to serve as either a main or sub-DPS character. Like all other Natlan characters, Mavuika will have the Nightsoul system implemented in her kit.

One of the most unique aspects of her design is the Pyro-infused motorcycle, which can be used to travel the overworld or deal massive amounts of AoE damage. Even though beta testing revealed that Mavuika's DPS numbers can get quite high, many fans seem disappointed in her overall power, claiming they expected more from the leader of Natlan. Compared to previous Genshin Impact Archons, who are known for their flexibility, Mavuika's kit seems much more restrictive, especially because it requires Nightsoul points to function effectively.

Mavuika should have great synergy with the other five-star character in this update, Citlali, whose kit makes her a strong choice for teams with Pyro DPS units. According to beta data, Citlali's kit in Genshin Impact will heavily revolve around her Elemental Skill, which allows her to create a powerful shield, summon a creature called Itzpapa, and deal AoE Cryo damage.

item.title: What You Need To Know About PlayStation Plus
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All The PlayStation Plus Tiers
    • Which PS Plus Tier Should You Buy?
  • How Much Does PS Plus Cost?
    • PS Plus Essential
    • PS Plus Extra
    • PS Plus Premium
  • How To Subscribe To PlayStation Plus?
    • How To Subscribe To PS Plus Using The PS5
    • How To Subscribe To PS Plus Using A Web Browser
    • How To Cancel A PS Plus Subscription?
  • What Is PS Plus On PC?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Can PS Plus Premium Subscribers Stream PS5 Games?
    • When Are New Games Added To PS Plus Premium & Extra?
    • Can Subscribers Switch Tiers?
    • Can PS Plus Benefits Be Shared?
    • Which PlayStation Plus should I Get?
  • PS Plus Essential Free Games For December 2024
    • It Takes Two (PS5/PS4); Temtem (PS5); Aliens: Dark Descent (PS5/PS4)
  • What Games Are On PlayStation Plus Extra & Premium?
    • Every PS5 Game On PS Plus Extra & Premium
    • Every PS4 Game On PS Plus Extra & Premium
  • What Classics Are On PlayStation Plus Premium?
    • Every PS5/PS4 Game Only On PS Plus Premium (Including Remasters Of PS3, Vita, & PSP Games)
    • Every PS3 Game On PS Plus Premium
    • Every PS1, PS2, & PSP Game On PS Plus Premium
    • Every PS VR2 Game On PS Plus Premium
  • PS Plus Extra & Premium December 2024 New Games
    • Sonic Frontiers, Forspoken, Star Wars, & More
  • Games Leaving PS Plus In January 2025
    • Resident Evil 2, Dragon Ball FighterZ, Just Cause, & More
  • PS Plus Game Trials
  • Sony Pictures Core

Sony's PlayStation Plus is a well-known brand with a long history, but the service received a substantial makeover in 2022. Combining the original version with PS Now, the platform adopted a tiered system that seemed designed to offer something equivalent to Xbox Game Pass, with the higher levels containing extensive libraries of games that are updated monthly.

Although not without its controversies or criticisms, PS Plus has stabilized by this point, making it a consistently valid option for PS5 and even PS4 owners. As the service offers a lot of content along with different price points and features, here are the major things everyone should know about PS Plus.

Updated on December 18, 2024 by Mark Sammut: The Extra and Premium tier games for December 2024 have been added. Also, Sony announced which games will be leaving in January 2025.

All The PlayStation Plus Tiers

Rather than present a one-size-fits-all subscription, PS Plus lets users have their pick from three tiers: Essential , Extra , and Premium . Here is a summary of each level's offerings:

  • Essential – The core PS Plus benefits as they were prior to the 2022 relaunch. Subscribers gain access to online multiplayer, monthly games, exclusive discounts, and a few other benefits.
  • Extra – Essential tier benefits + a catalog of downloadable PS5 and PS4 games.
  • Premium – Essential & Extra tiers benefits + a catalog of classic PS3, PS2, PS1, and PSP games.

Ultimately, picking a PS Plus tier comes down to someone's needs. If a player will only be using the online multiplayer feature, Essential will suffice and there is little to gain from subscribing to one of the higher tiers.

Premium's central selling is its Classics Catalog, which adds hundreds of titles on top of the PS5 and PS4 games that are also available in the Extra tier. While this collection is grand, please note that PS3 games are played through Cloud Streaming and cannot be downloaded. Consequently, their performance is dependent on the user's internet connection.

Which PS Plus Tier Should You Buy?

As there is quite a jump in price from one level to the next, a full breakdown of each tier's features and benefits might help someone decide whether they should go for Essential, Extra, or Premium.

Essential

Extra

Premium

Monthly Games

Yes

Yes

Yes

Online Multiplayer

Yes

Yes

Yes

Exclusive Discounts

Yes

Yes

Yes

Cloud Storage

Yes

Yes

Yes

Share Play

Yes

Yes

Yes

The PlayStation Plus Collection (PS5 Only)

Yes

Yes

Yes

Exclusive Content

Yes

Yes

Yes

Game Catalog – PS5 & PS4 Games

No

Yes

Yes

Ubisoft+ Classics

No

Yes

Yes

Classics Catalog – PS3, PS2, PS1, and PSP Games

No

No

Yes

Cloud Streaming

No

No

Yes

PS Plus on PC (Using Cloud Streaming)

No

No

Yes

Game Trials

No

No

Yes

Sony Pictures Catalogue/Sony Pictures Core

No

No

Yes

Crunchyroll Content (As Part of Sony Pictures Catalogue)

No

No

Yes

How Much Does PS Plus Cost?

Each PS Plus tier has its own price point to match the benefits included with the subscription.

PS Plus Essential

  • 1-Month Subscription: $9.99
  • 3-Month Subscription: $24.99
  • 12-Month Subscription: $79.99

PS Plus Extra

  • 1-Month Subscription: $14.99
  • 3-Month Subscription: $39.99
  • 12-Month Subscription: $134.99

PS Plus Premium

  • 1-Month Subscription: $17.99
  • 3-Month Subscription: $49.99
  • 12-Month Subscription: $159.99

How To Subscribe To PlayStation Plus?

The process to subscribe to PS Plus is quite straightforward, and there are a couple of avenues people can use to get there.

Newcomers to Sony's ecosystem will first need to create a PlayStation Network account as this is required to utilize any service, including buying games from the PS Store. An account by following this link.

How To Subscribe To PS Plus Using The PS5

The most convenient way to subscribe to PS Plus is through the PS5 or PS4 console.

  1. Log into the home screen.
  2. Navigate to the PlayStation Plus panel
  3. Select " Subscribe "
  4. Pick Essential, Extra, or Premium
  5. Pick a Payment Plan

How To Subscribe To PS Plus Using A Web Browser

It is also possible to subscribe to PS Plus directly from a web browser. Visit this playstation.com page and scroll down to the " Choose Your Membership Plan ." From there, choose a tier and select " Add to Cart ." After that, simply check out to complete the transaction.

How To Cancel A PS Plus Subscription?

There might come a time when someone might wish to cancel their PS Plus subscription. The process is quite uncomplicated:

  1. On a web browser, head to the Sony Network's Account Management page.
  2. From the menu's PlayStation Network options, select " Subscription ."
  3. Select " Cancel Subscription " near PlayStation Plus.

Account Management's Subscription page also allows players to change their PS Plus tiers or payment frequency.

What Is PS Plus On PC?

PS Plus Premium subscribers also have the option to stream games via the service's PC app. The library includes titles from both the Games and Classics Catalog, although it is not the full selection. Here are some things interested parties should know about this option:

  • The DualShock 4 is the only confirmed compatible controller . That does not mean other controllers will not work, just that they are not guaranteed by Sony.
  • PS Plus On PC is not currently available in every country that has the main streaming service.
  • PS5 games cannot be streamed.
  • A PS5 or PS4 is not needed to subscribe to PS Plus on PC.
  • Sony recommends a Broadband wired internet connection of a minimum of 5 Mbps ​​​​.

Frequently Asked Questions

Can PS Plus Premium Subscribers Stream PS5 Games?

PS Plus Premium's Cloud Streaming is compatible with the Games Catalog's PS4 games and all the titles found in the Classics Catalog. PS5 games cannot be streamed .

When Are New Games Added To PS Plus Premium & Extra?

Sony has not specified a fixed date of when subscribers can anticipate new additions to the library, but history suggests that games will be added roughly halfway through a month.

Can Subscribers Switch Tiers?

Yes. If someone wants to move up to a higher PS Plus tier, they only need to purchase a new membership at their desired level . This upgrade will happen instantly, and the customer will be charged a prorated fee for the rest of the current month.

If a member wishes to downgrade their tier, they would need to visit their Sony account's " Subscription " tab to perform the change. This alteration will come into effect once the next payment is made.

Can PS Plus Benefits Be Shared?

While limited to one PS5 or PS4 console, certain PS Plus benefits are shared among the different accounts on the system. These include online multiplayer, access to Premium & Extra's libraries, downloaded monthly games, and games purchased using a PS Plus discount .

Which PlayStation Plus should I Get?

Ultimately, this comes down to personal preference. If someone only intends to play PS5 and PS4 games, there is little reason to subscribe to Premium.

PS Plus Essential Free Games For December 2024

It Takes Two (PS5/PS4); Temtem (PS5); Aliens: Dark Descent (PS5/PS4)

With the holiday season here, Sony has revealed the final PS Plus Essential lineup for 2024. While not the most exciting on paper, the selection is arguably well-rounded and should offer something for most players. It Takes Two is one of the best co-op games on the PS5, and the emphasis is on "co-op" since the campaign requires two players. No solo alternative, which will automatically disqualify Hazelight's project as an option for a percentage of subscribers. Still, if someone has a partner, they should give this one a try.

Aliens: Dark Descent is all about colonial marines taking the fight to Xenomorphs, one strategic battle after another. Presented from an isometric angle, the game takes quite a few pages from X-COM 's playbook, which is not a bad thing. Strategy games are an acquired taste, but this release is relatively accessible thanks to its IP. Finally, there is Temtem , one of the better alternatives to Pokemon . Players will catch creatures, build a team, level up, take on dojos, and grind. The formula works pretty well.

What Games Are On PlayStation Plus Extra & Premium?

  • Current as of November 28, 2024

Most subscribers will likely invest in PS Plus Extra as that tier contains more than enough PS5 and PS4 games to keep someone busy for a long time. Unless specifically interested in classic PS games or Cloud Streaming, there is not much reason to pick Premium over Extra. Still, subscribers of both tiers can download and install the following titles.

PS Plus' game library can vary from country to country.

Every PS5 Game On PS Plus Extra & Premium

What Classics Are On PlayStation Plus Premium?

PS Plus Premium celebrates PlayStation's past, bringing together titles released over the span of more than two decades. If a PS5 or PS4 owner wants to play some old favorites, this tier should deliver.

PS Plus Extra & Premium December 2024 New Games

Sonic Frontiers, Forspoken, Star Wars, & More

Extra & Premium

Premium Only

December 17, 2024

  • A Space for the Unbound (PS5/PS4)
  • Biped (PS5/PS4)
  • Coffee Talk (PS5/PS4)
  • Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly (PS5/PS4)
  • FIST: Forged in Shadow Torch (PS5/PS4)
  • Forspoken (PS5)
  • Jurassic World Evolution 2 (PS5/PS4)
  • PHOGS (PS4)
  • Rabbids: Party of Legends (PS4)
  • Sonic Frontiers (PS5/PS4)
  • WRC Generations (PS5/PS4)

  • Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge

December 10, 2024

  • Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy
  • Sly 2: Band of Thieves
  • Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves

PS Plus Extra and Premium's December 2024 games cover a fairly vast spectrum of genres, themes, and tones. More importantly, the lineup has a few titles that might have just fallen short of convincing people to buy them outright, with the two headline acts being the most obvious examples. Naturally, Sonic the Hedgehog is among the biggest IPs in video game history, but its modern releases are the definition inconsistent. Sonic Frontiers just screams "love or hate it," and its arrival on PS Plus Extra presents the perfect opportunity for subscribers to learn which side of the fence they fall on.

Forspoken is in a similar spot as Sonic Frontiers , to the point that both of them take place in open-worlds. Square Enix's 2023 release attracted a lot of criticism for its story, protagonist, and empty map, culminating in a pretty negative reputation that saw Forspoken become one of the year's most disappointing games. That said, the project is not without positives, especially the fast-paced gameplay that expands as the campaign progresses. Certainly worth a try if somebody saw some gameplay footage that caught their interest.

The rest of Extra's lineup consists of highly-rated but niche games. Jurassic World Evolution 2 lets players live out their dinosaur-managing fantasies, allowing them to run multiple parks and even create unique creatures. Coffee Talk and its sequel are cozy, well-written indie darlings, and the same extends to A Space for the Unbound . Biped and Phogs should keep local and online co-op fans busy for a while, while Rabbids: Party of Legends is an OK mini-game collection. WRC Generations is a well above-average rally racing sim, and F.I.S.T: Forged in Shadow Torch is a very good Metroidvania.

Premium tier members have received three PS2 classics: Sly 2 , Sly 3 , and Jak and Daxter . These were all available in some form already, but these iterations are the originals. PS VR2 owners can take a trip to a galaxy far, far away with Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge .

Games Leaving PS Plus In January 2025

Resident Evil 2, Dragon Ball FighterZ, Just Cause, & More

Subscription Tiers

Games

Departure Dates

Extra & Premium

  • Dragon Ball FighterZ
  • Hardspace Shipbreaker
  • Just Cause 3
  • Just Cause 4
  • Legend of Mana
  • Life is Strange
  • Life is Strange Before the Storm
  • Pure Hold'em
  • Resident Evil 2
  • Secret of Mana
  • Street Fighter 30th Anniversary

January 14, 2025

As exciting as new PS Plus arrivals are, they consistently coincide with departures, with a similar number of games leaving the service. 2025 will not change this trend, and Sony has revealed which games will be saying goodbye to the Extra and Premium tiers roughly halfway through January. More departures could be announced at a later date, but so far, 11 titles are set to end their tenures.

The biggest departing name is arguably Resident Evil 2 , the 2019 remake that modernized an all-time great PS1 classic. A strong argument could be made that this entry represents the franchise at its peak, and any horror fans owe it to themselves to play through both campaigns. Dragon Ball FighterZ is also leaving PS Plus Extra, which is a shame as it is among the best fighting games on the subscription service. Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Collection is also leaving.

A few IPs will also be losing some entries. Life is Strange and Before the Storm are two pretty great adventure games, with the former being particularly highly regarded. Just Cause 3 and 4 are just fun, dumb open-world romps that excel at unfiltered chaos. Legend of Mana and Secret of Mana are based on beloved action JRPGs, and they will be missed. Even Hardspace: Shipbreaker is a worthwhile niche option.

PS Plus Game Trials

Besides instant access to PS Plus's Game and Classics Catalogs, Premium subscribers can also try out a select few PS5 and PS4 titles for a limited time. Players can currently test out more than 60 games, and their trial periods vary in length.

Check out the below article to see a list of PS Plus Premium game trials.

Sony Pictures Core

A little-known feature available to Premium subscribers, Sony Pictures Core is a steaming service that contains over 2000 movies that can be rented or bought. Anyone can create an account, but people who have a Premium subscription have access to a range of movies.

Most of the biggest recent titles will need to be purchased, but the selection has a couple of older titles that can keep someone entertained for a few hours when they do not feel like playing a game. The Sony Pictures Catalogue also includes anime content from Crunchyroll.
